name: carrinho-ecommerce-api
description: API REST para gestão de carrinho de compras em e-commerce

scripts.test:report: cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha tests/**/*.test.js --timeout 10000 --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=reports,reportFilename=test-report,reportTitle='Relatório de Testes - API Carrinho',reportPageTitle='Testes da API Carrinho',embeddedScreenshots=true,inlineAssets=true,overwrite=true,html=true,json=true

author: Estudos de Teste de Software
